title: Chlorine Dioxide Generating Aerosol
fig_desc: FIG. 1 is a schematic diagram illustrating an example of an aerosol product of a double structure container
all_fig_descs: FIG. 1 is a schematic diagram illustrating an example of an aerosol product of a double structure container

FIG. 1 is a schematic diagram illustrating an example of an aerosol product of a double-structure container, and FIG. 2 is a schematic diagram illustrating a cross section of an actuator (discharge mechanism) of the double-structure container of FIG. 2 is-structure container 10 has a metal-made pressure container (outer container) 11 provided with an aerosol valve 12
